titleStmt.title: A letter from on board the York-Frigat now with Admiral Herbert dated from Cape-Cleare the fourth of this instant May : giving a true and large account of the great flight between the English and the French at Bantry-Bay near Crouck-Haven in the west of Ireland.
titleStmt.author: Feud, C.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Chetham's Library.
